requestParams.name: card_alias
requestParams.desc: 商家会员卡的唯一标识

requestParams.name: page
requestParams.desc: 每页默认20条，最大支持500页

responseParams.name: total
responseParams.desc: 会员卡对应的会员个数

struct.name: total
struct.desc: 会员卡对应的会员个数

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['page']=1
params['card_alias']="Y2x42qhvviya8l"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.scrm.customer.search', '3.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

'1', 'card_alias' => 'Y2x42qhvviya8l', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->get($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';

name: search
scenarios: 会员卡对应的会员列表，此接口需申请高级权限方可调用。仅支持免签名通讯协议(AccessToken)调用,不支持签名通讯协议(AppId/AppSecret)调用。
desc: 会员卡对应的会员列表
